Bookmarks: Create personalized bookmarks by attaching a small note or a ribbon to the top of the stapler and using it to mark your place in a book.
Pencil Holder: Attach a small container or envelope to the stapler to use as a pen or pencil holder.
Desk Organizer: Attach a small tray or container to the stapler to create a desk organizer for holding small office supplies.
Keychain: Attach a keychain or a small charm to the stapler to make a unique and personalized keychain.
Paperweight: Use the stapler as a paperweight to keep papers from blowing away in the wind.
